Как можно считать ЭТО шедевром? После часа игры в это, даже "Месть боксера" кажется просто ИДЕАЛЬНЕЙШЕЙ игрой. Отвратительнейший сюжет(нет,сюжета здесь особо и нет), отвратительнейшие пострелушки (ИИ ботов самый тупой,даже в сравнении с 3D DOOM), отвратительнейшая графика (даже по меркам 2004 года,текстурки и гамма давит на глаза). В это невозможно играть! Пожалел уже десятый раз,что приобрел это УГ на распродаже. Красная цена сему "шедевру" - 0,001$. Даже инди-игрушки куда интереснее. Но это всего лишь мое скромное мнение, как говорится "ИМХО". Свое складывайте сами.

Ох мы сним подружились в 2008 году. Эта игра захватила компанию VALVe. Я эту игру прошёл более 35 раз! А какая графика была в те года...ооой...эта была жесть, сюжет, джиман,Гордон,и многие другие персонажи.
Игра была размещена в журналах Игромания. Когда я в первый раз играл в эту игру, я был в виртуальном мире HALF-LIFE.Игра похожа на S.T.A.L.K.E.R, и на Metro 2033. Атомосфера в игре фантастическая. Люди спомните нулевые, и сыграйте в легендарную игру HALF-LIFE 2

Do I really have to say anything about this classic? Really? Okay, here I go: Imagine you have a potato machine and suddenly you can run a game with the graphics of... Shadow of Mordor. With the game mechanics of the first Half Life (which deserve a whole paragraph for itself) and long like ... I don't know... a Metroid game (probably exagerating on this one)... That's how I felt in 2004 when this game went out. Almost 13 years later, it is still good. Play it, do yourself a favor.

Half-Life 2 - шутер всех времен и народов. Игра примечательна прекрасной физикой на движке Source, продвинутым искусственным интеллектом, великолепной графикой, актуальной и по сей день, увлекающим сюжетом. Продуманные локации, классный саундтрек - всё это ждёт вас в этой замечательной игре! Рекомендую....

[h1] The good ol' days [/h1]
I love Half-Life the series is very great and the story is very interesting not like any other games, this doesn't have any cut scenes which is a freaking great thing for a video game with it intense action and a little hince of horror this game is what the world will be talking about in the later future, the game has a lot of innovations that has since then become an inspiration to other games/developers and has changed the way video games are meant to be played. Even if the series is dead or alive it is still nice to see that Half-Life has changed a lot in the 90's to the 20's. 

[h1] The pros [/h1]
[list]
[*]Amazing graphics in it's time.
[*]Good story, gameplay and mechanics.
[*]Good voice acting.
[*]Amazing physics in it's time.
[/list]

[h1] The cons [/h1]
[list]
[*]None
Complete this game's franchise then your Life is Half more complete.

Half-Life 2 - is the continuation of the great Half-Life, which has become a classic in the gaming industry.
Half-Life 2 became more open, racing, scary, with the atmosphere of the post-apocalypse.
The plot is fascinating and interesting, from the second half begins a large number of action.
The gameplay (for 2004) is primitive, but not boring.
Graphics (for 2004) breakthrough, the Source engine provides an excellent picture for perception.
Music is completely suitable for battles against the Combine.

我玩半条命2是今年才玩的，简单难度还没有通关，但是这并不能说明半条命2的差劲。在我眼中，它在几十年后的今天也十分优秀。当我周围的同学都被TX给诱惑时，我在一旁默默地玩半条命。这则评论不是很好，但是我仍旧爱着这款创世之作，让我们随着戈登.弗里曼博士的步伐，提着物理学圣剑向前冲吧。
                                                                               一个初中生的救赎
AMAZING GAME EVER!

It's a single player game that takes place in a nearby future. You play as Gorgon  Freeman following a little bit of the story line from the first game in the sequel. In this jorney you will come across diferent types of weapons that you must use to solve small puzzles and progress in the game. With a whole lot of action (and a bit of horror) you will have an experience that only few games can provide. 
(You may come across some tiny little bugs but remember that, unfortunatly, its quite hard to build a "perfect game") 

[b]Final score: 9,2/10[/b]
This is something more than "good shit"
Great old game :-*

Just got this along with Half-Life on the summer sale. I have wanted to play these classics for years, and I was very disappointed. I cannot understand why this series is so well-loved. I absolutely hated the first one, and even though the sequel improved A LOT, it was still pretty underwhelming. 

The plot is convoluted, and  while playing, I didn't at all understand who the different alien races where, who was doing what and why, or basically anything other than the blow-by-blow of whom I was supposed to be killing at any given time.

The combat itself is good. I mostly enjoyed the parts when I was actually in firefights. I especially love how satisfying it is to snipe with the crossbow. But any time you're in a chapter with a squad following you, boy oh boy, get ready to be pissed off. Every time I needed to move around a corner carefully, they crowded around and got themselves shot. I'd enter a room to clear it, and they'd be in my way while I tried to leave. I'd dart around a corner to throw a grenade, then get shot to shit because they wouldn't let me go back behind cover. Absolutely infuriating. Also, they would often come out of nowhere in a battle zone without any warning. Good thing friendly-fire isn't possible, because I blew them away when they did that.

There were never times that I really got pumped for the game. No heart-racing, totally engaged, "damn, this is exciting" moments. More memorable is how annoyed I was by being pinned down by multiple super powerful enemies and scrambling around like a mouse, trying to find ammo to blow them up, or alternatedly how incredibly bored I was while waiting through literally minutes-long scenes for dubious plot developement by the not particularly convincing voice acting.


SPOILERS BELOW



SPOILERS BELOW


And then, to top it all off, it ends with another, goddamn, piece of shit, mother-fucking, random, who the fuck is this briefcase guy, lazy way out writing scene with no actual wrap-up, but also no edge-of-the seat cliff-hanger, because obviously this guy just has some sort of multi-dimensional control over me. Either Alex is dead because the writers want us to feel something, or she is alive because the writers need her to move the plot forward. Either way makes no difference, because the briefcase dude is controlling everying. Shitty ending, and if there were ever to be a Half-Life 3, I probably wouldn't bother playing it.
Yes, Just yes get it man.
